snippet: A native of Kolkata, India, writes of attending Harvey Mudd College in California, where she studied physics and math, as well as philosophy and creative writing, an experience that taught her how to think critically and ask questions.
abstract: A native of Kolkata, India, writes of attending Harvey Mudd College in California, where she studied physics and math, as well as philosophy and creative writing, an experience that taught her how to think critically and ask questions.

headline.main: Why a Liberal Arts Education Matters
